screen.webdisc.title: WebDisc
screen.webdisc.label: Enter URL:
webdisc.ffmpeg.missing: FFmpeg is required for WebDisc. Put ffmpeg into WebDisc/ffmpeg or enable downloadFFmpeg in config.
webdisc.ytdlp.missing: yt-dlp is required for WebDisc. Put yt-dlp into WebDisc/youtubedl or enable downloadYoutubeDL in config.
item.webdisc.desc: Play your music via URL from YouTube and other platforms
